job_tasks.phrase: aligning technology with client business goals
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding client business goals and aligning technical solutions with them.

job_tasks.phrase: advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation
job_tasks.justification: This indicates understanding client needs and providing expert advice on how to structure and create specific components for their business.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the importance of meeting client expectations and aligning the delivered solutions with their needs.

job_tasks.phrase: gathering and analyzing customer business requirements
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to understanding and analyzing the business needs of customers.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure 100% of clients achieve 100% of their business goals through AI-driven professional services engagements
job_tasks.justification: This statement clearly focuses on achieving client business goals through the services provided.

job_tasks.phrase: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the use of generative AI for improving processes and validating outcomes, which falls under applying AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters
job_tasks.justification: This implies leveraging AI models to automate tasks and focus on higher-level work.

job_tasks.phrase: using AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic
job_tasks.justification: This describes the application of AI for automation and strategic enhancement, which is a form of modeling.
This suggests employing AI capabilities to achieve new or advanced results.

job_tasks.phrase: training clients on the software platform
job_tasks.justification: This involves guiding users on how to effectively use a software platform, which can involve demonstrating features and best practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.
job_tasks.justification: This involves setting up and customizing aspects of a software platform, which is a form of system configuration and development support.
This is a direct reference to the development or construction of systems.
This implies that the engagements themselves are built around AI-driven processes and services.

soft_skills.phrase: at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery
fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered
focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients
AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service
thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals
gotten really good at using generative AI tools over the past couple of years
advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes using generative AI tools for client service and business consulting, rather than building or fine-tuning the AI models themselves. While AI is central, the core tasks lean towards business understanding and client advisory, with a focus on leveraging existing AI tools rather than developing new AI systems or models.
